name: CommLib
short_description: CommLib is an IPC library for Unix systems. It allows related and unrelated process to communicate using several methods (FIFOs, PIPEs, shared memory, RPC etc.) using unique, consistent APIs. This will allow the programmer to choose the best and most perf
